DOC.brief_summary: This study compare repeat intermittent IV dose diclofenac patient moderate severe post-surgical pain elective orthopedic surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety IV Diclofenac ( DIV075V ) Pain After Elective Orthopedic Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective evaluate analgesic efficacy safety three dosage level parenteral diclofenac provide pain relief compare placebo Ketorolac tromethamine .
DOC.criteria: Scheduled within three week screen visit undergo elective orthopedic surgery . Moderate severe pain within 6 hour follow completion require surgery . Chronic pain condition . Chronic disease recent cardiovascular event . Known allergy hypersensitivity active compound excipients use study .
